about.title:
Univus is not a service,
but an experience

project.title: Hiru-kuru (Daily Deli)
project.text: Add a little extra to your lunch, even on your busiest days
project.highlight: Your precious one-hour break in the midst of a busy 8-hour workday.
project.description: Enjoy a delicious meal and a relaxing break. Hiru-Kuru (Daily Deli) makes your time even more special with fresh, tasty, clean, and convenient meals, all served with care.

crew1.title: Ha
crew1.intro: I want to share the small joys of everyday life in a more enjoyable way.

crew2.title: Mori
crew2.intro: I strive to offer experiences that are not just mere services, but ones that are truly memorable.

crew3.title: Kunitake
crew3.intro: I want to provide a service that is easy to access for everyone.

crew4.title: Anonymous
crew4.intro: The crew is preparing an introduction
